name: Explorer 2
description:
the story behind this game is that you were sick of the city and your day job so you saved up for a boat to get out to sea for a long vacation but when you got on the boat you ended up crashing into a deserted island. on this island, you will need to build a rocket to get off (which would have carried over into the next game)

This was the second and last game in a series I made 6 years ago but the version of the language I was using was very limiting so in order to post it I needed to rewrite the code to work in this new version. I would have started with the first game but its just to far gone so I decided to just rewrite the second game.
